thought: To craft a grindstone, I need to craft 2 sticks and 1 acacia plank. I have 2 sticks in my inventory, but I do not have any acacia planks. I need to craft 1 acacia plank, which requires placing 1 acacia wood in the crafting table. I have 1 acacia wood at slot 34, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1
